texto: 5.8 Mutually beneficial supplier relationships “An organization and its suppliers are interdependent and a mutually beneficial relationship enhances the ability of both to create value.” (ISO 9000:2005) Figure 9 — Mutually beneficial supplier relationships © ISO 2006 – All rights reserved 11 ISO 10014:2006(E) Annex A (informative) Self-assessment of implementation of management principles A.1 Maturity level descriptions Prior to use of self-assessment questionnaires, the assessment team should familiarize themselves with maturity level descriptions (Table A.1).
